data.comment: The first-half is under way at Stade Maurice Dufrasne - Liege kick-off to start the match.
Genk's Jhon Lucumi has been booked in Liege.
In the minute 44, Selim Amallah is booked for the home team.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Genk kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 51, At Stade Maurice Dufrasne, Mergim Vojvoda has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Liege make their first substitution with Duje Cop replacing Aleksandar Boljevic.
Obbi Oulare is on a sub for Felipe Avenatti for Liege.
In the minute 75, Kostas Laifis (Liege) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Daniel Munoz for Genk has been booked by Nicolas Laforge and receives a first yellow card.
Collins Fai (Liege) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, Nicolas Gavory (Liege) gets a yellow card.
Luca Oyen is replacing Cyriel Dessers for Genk at Stade Maurice Dufrasne.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Selim Amallah (Liege) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
